sahana poli anupatha matha mehidi prathilabhin 1560denakuta rupiyal koti dahaatahamaraka mudalak pirinamini.mese ekathu karana mudalin haki nam uthure janathawa wenuwen niwesak , krida pitiyak , margayak sada penwana lesa janadhipathithuma abhiyoga kaleya.kilinochchiye niwes athi atham deshapalanagnyayange daruwan wideshayanhi adhyapanaya labaddi uthure samanya janathawage daruwanta siduwa aththe awrashmiyen pelennata bawath janadhipathithuma prakasha kaleya.eheth thanapathi karyala gane gos demala janathawage ayithin pilibanda katha karannata nam mowunta welawa thibena bawa pawasu janadhipathithuma uthure janathawa agadhayata ada damanne me pirisa bawath awadharanaya kaleya.
